name: Alien Murder Simulator
description:
Built in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 33 jam.

Kill all the humans and cocoon them on board the ship before making your escape. Don't worry too much about getting killed, as long as you've cocooned at least one victim you'll be reborn!

Built in Unity. Fullscreen disabled by default, with resolution set to 1920x1080. Only supports 16:9 aspect ratios.

Ludum Dare page here: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=p...

Alien and Human models and anims by Alastair Low.

Music from Kevin MacLeod's excellent collection - http://incompetech.com/

Controls are shown on the title screen.

Enjoy!
